description: Try our easy to follow Triple Chocolate Fondue Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Triple Chocolate Fondue Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 3 x 5cm squares (6cm-deep) from the top of hot cross loaf. Remove bread from squares and cut into cubes for dipping.

Place white chocolate, and 1/4 cup thickened cream in a saucepan and cook over medium-low heat until smooth and combined. Pour into one of the square holes in loaf. Repeat process twice more with milk chocolate and 1/4 thickened cream, then with dark chocolate and remaining thickened cream.
Serve fondue with fruit, pretzels, potato chips, meringues, marshmallows and wafers.
